title: 'Became blunt in just three months! The unbluntable titanic dies.'
body: 'It just became so blunt within three months! I used it to cut some elastoplast. There is no residue or looseness or visible damage to the edges but it just does not cut. I have requested support for the replacement or refund on the scotch website since it has a lifetime warranty. Ill update what happens. Till then perish the thought of buying this beautiful looking scissors that will die on you soon.'

title: 'Not non-sticky'
body: The media could not be loaded. The product is fine and sharp. But, not non-sticky as advertised. Opening the scissors seems slower now due to stickiness.  The video is made the same day the item is delivered. Nice finish, very easy to hold without any issues, looks very nice, but not non-sticky. And they don't have return policy. So, buy at your own risk.

title: 'Detailed Product Review | After ~1.5 Year of Usage'
body: 'The 3M Scotch Titanium Scissors are a great choice for those looking for a durable and high-quality pair of scissors. These scissors are 8 inches in length making them perfect for a variety of tasks such as cutting fabric paper and more. The blades are made of titanium which ensures that they are strong long-lasting and resistant to corrosion.  One of the standout features of these scissors is the non-stick coating on the blades. This makes them great for cutting through tape glue and other adhesives without getting gummed up. The blades are also easy to clean so you can use them for a variety of tasks without having to worry about residue buildup.  The ergonomic handles are another feature that sets these scissors apart. They are comfortable to hold and use which can be especially important if you will be using them for extended periods of time. The handles are also designed to reduce hand fatigue which is a great benefit for those who do a lot of cutting.  In terms of price the 3M Scotch Titanium Scissors are on the higher end of the spectrum but they are worth the investment if you want a durable and high-quality pair of scissors. They compare favorably to other high-end scissors in terms of durability and performance making them a great choice for those who demand the best from their tools.  Overall the 3M Scotch Titanium Scissors are an excellent choice for those looking for a pair of scissors that are durable high-quality and versatile. They are well worth the investment and should last for many years with proper care.'

title: '1 scissor faulted within days'
body: 'Have been using Godrej Cartini for years never faced problem. Purchased two of these for non-stick feature for more than triple the amount. Tried to repair it locally repairman said "China item unrepairable". Not worth it. Go buy Godrej Cartini.'
